#summary &updownarrow; character entity

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesU U] > &updownarrow;

== Value ==

There are 3 variations of this entity:

  * `&UpDownArrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2195/index.htm U+02195].
  * `&Updownarrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/21d5/index.htm U+021D5].
  * `&updownarrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2195/index.htm U+02195].
